properties.areaDesc: Southeast Randolph; Southeast Fayette; Southeast Nicholas; Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Webster
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 24 at 2:24AM EST until January 24 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Southeast Fayette, Southeast Nicholas, Southeast
Webster, Northwest Pocahontas and Southeast Randolph Counties.

* WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 10 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gustiest winds will be in the highest
elevations.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
